rivalry.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a situation in which two or more people, teams, or companies are competing for something, especially over a long period of time, and the feeling of competition between them
rivalry.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The two players have developed a friendly rivalry.
She had never overcome her feelings of sibling rivalry  (=rivalry between brothers and sisters).
There has always been intense rivalry between New Zealand and Australia.
rivalry.translation[1].definitions[0].de: competition between people, companies, organizations etc who are in the same business or selling similar goods or services in the same market
rivalry.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: There is considerable rivalry between banks and accountancy firms when it comes to giving corporate financial advice.
